verses.verse: And the men <S%H376><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, Why <S%H4100><s%> have you served <S%H6213><s%> us thus, <S%H1697><s%> <S%H2007><s%> that you called <S%H7121><s%> us not, when <S%H3588><s%> you went <S%H1980><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> with the Midianites? <S%H4080><s%> And they did chide <S%H7378><s%> with him sharply. <S%H2394><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to them, What <S%H4100><s%> have I done <S%H6213><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> in comparison of you? Is not the gleaning <S%H5955><s%> of the grapes of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> better <S%H2896><s%> than the vintage <S%H1210><s%> of Abiezer? <S%H44><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> has delivered <S%H5414><s%> into your hands <S%H3027><s%> the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Midian, <S%H4080><s%> Oreb <S%H6157><s%> and Zeeb: <S%H2062><s%> and what <S%H4100><s%> was I able <S%H3201><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> in comparison of you? Then <S%H227><s%> their anger <S%H7307><s%> was abated <S%H7503><s%> toward him, when he had said <S%H1696><s%> that.

And Gideon <S%H1439><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and passed <S%H5674><s%> over, <S%H5674><s%> he, and the three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men <S%H376><s%> that were with him, faint, <S%H5889><s%> yet pursuing <S%H7291><s%> them.

And he said <S%H559><s%> to the men <S%H582><s%> of Succoth, <S%H5523><s%> Give, <S%H5414><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, loaves <S%H3603><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%> that follow <S%H7272><s%> me; for they be faint, <S%H5889><s%> and I am pursuing <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna, <S%H6759><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of Midian. <S%H4080><s%>

And the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Succoth <S%H5523><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Are the hands <S%H3709><s%> of Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna <S%H6759><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> in your hand, <S%H3027><s%> that we should give <S%H5414><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> to your army? <S%H6635><s%>

And Gideon <S%H1439><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Therefore when the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has delivered <S%H5414><s%> Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna <S%H6759><s%> into my hand, <S%H3027><s%> then I will tear <S%H1758><s%> your flesh <S%H1320><s%> with the thorns <S%H6975><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> and with briers. <S%H1303><s%>

And he went <S%H5927><s%> up there <S%H8033><s%> to Penuel, <S%H6439><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> to them likewise: <S%H2063><s%> and the men <S%H582><s%> of Penuel <S%H6439><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> him as the men <S%H582><s%> of Succoth <S%H5523><s%> had answered <S%H6030><s%> him.

And he spoke <S%H559><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> to the men <S%H582><s%> of Penuel, <S%H6439><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> When I come <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> in peace, <S%H7965><s%> I will break <S%H5422><s%> down <S%H5422><s%> this tower. <S%H4026><s%>

Now Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna <S%H6759><s%> were in Karkor, <S%H7174><s%> and their hosts <S%H4264><s%> with them, about fifteen <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men, all <S%H3605><s%> that were left <S%H3498><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the hosts <S%H4264><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of the east: <S%H6924><s%> for there fell <S%H5307><s%> an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> that drew <S%H8025><s%> sword. <S%H2719><s%>

And Gideon <S%H1439><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up by the way <S%H1870><s%> of them that dwelled <S%H7931><s%> in tents <S%H168><s%> on the east <S%H6924><s%> of Nobah <S%H5025><s%> and Jogbehah, <S%H3011><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> the host; <S%H4264><s%> for the host <S%H4264><s%> was secure. <S%H983><s%>

And when Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna <S%H6759><s%> fled, <S%H5127><s%> he pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them, and took <S%H3920><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of Midian, <S%H4080><s%> Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna, <S%H6759><s%> and discomfited <S%H2729><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the host. <S%H4264><s%>
And Gideon <S%H1439><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joash <S%H3101><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> from battle <S%H4421><s%> before <S%H4608><s%> the sun <S%H2775><s%> was up,

And caught <S%H3920><s%> a young <S%H5288><s%> man of the men <S%H582><s%> of Succoth, <S%H5523><s%> and inquired <S%H7592><s%> of him: and he described <S%H3789><s%> to him the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Succoth, <S%H5523><s%> and the elders <S%H2205><s%> thereof, even three score <S%H7657><s%> and seventeen <S%H7657><s%> <S%H7651><s%> men. <S%H376><s%>

And he came <S%H935><s%> to the men <S%H582><s%> of Succoth, <S%H5523><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Behold <S%H2009><s%> Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna, <S%H6759><s%> with whom <S%H834><s%> you did upbraid <S%H2778><s%> me, saying, <S%H559><s%> Are the hands <S%H3709><s%> of Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna <S%H6759><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> in your hand, <S%H3027><s%> that we should give <S%H5414><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> to your men <S%H582><s%> that are weary? <S%H3286><s%>

And he took <S%H3947><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> and thorns <S%H6975><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> and briers, <S%H1303><s%> and with them he taught <S%H3045><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> of Succoth. <S%H5523><s%>
And he beat <S%H5422><s%> down <S%H5422><s%> the tower <S%H4026><s%> of Penuel, <S%H6439><s%> and slew <S%H2026><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> of the city. <S%H5892><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> he to Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna, <S%H6759><s%> What <S%H375><s%> manner of men <S%H582><s%> were they whom <S%H834><s%> you slew <S%H2026><s%> at Tabor? <S%H8396><s%> And they answered, <S%H559><s%> As you are, so <S%H1992><s%> were they; each one <S%H259><s%> resembled <S%H8389><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of a king. <S%H4428><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> They were my brothers, <S%H251><s%> even the sons <S%H1121><s%> of my mother: <S%H517><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> lives, <S%H2416><s%> if <S%H3863><s%> you had saved <S%H2421><s%> them alive, <S%H2421><s%> I would not slay <S%H2026><s%> you.

And he said <S%H559><s%> to Jether <S%H3500><s%> his firstborn, <S%H1060><s%> Up, and slay <S%H2026><s%> them. But the youth <S%H5288><s%> drew <S%H8025><s%> not his sword: <S%H2719><s%> for he feared, <S%H3372><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he was yet <S%H5750><s%> a youth. <S%H5288><s%>

Then Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna <S%H6759><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Rise <S%H6965><s%> you, and fall <S%H6293><s%> on us: for as the man <S%H376><s%> is, so is his strength. <S%H1369><s%> And Gideon <S%H1439><s%> arose, <S%H6965><s%> and slew <S%H2026><s%> Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna, <S%H6759><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> away the ornaments <S%H7720><s%> that were on their camels' <S%H1581><s%> necks. <S%H6677><s%>

Then the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Gideon, <S%H1439><s%> Rule <S%H4910><s%> you over us, both <S%H1571><s%> you, and your son, <S%H1121><s%> and your son's <S%H1121><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> also: <S%H1571><s%> for you have delivered <S%H3467><s%> us from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Midian. <S%H4080><s%>

And Gideon <S%H1439><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, I will not rule <S%H4910><s%> over you, neither <S%H3808><s%> shall my son <S%H1121><s%> rule <S%H4910><s%> over you: the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall rule <S%H4910><s%> over you.

And Gideon <S%H1439><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, I would desire <S%H7592><s%> a request <S%H7596><s%> of you, that you would give <S%H5414><s%> me every man <S%H376><s%> the earrings <S%H5141><s%> of his prey. <S%H7998><s%> (For they had golden <S%H2091><s%> earrings, <S%H5141><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they were Ishmaelites. <S%H3459><s%>)

And they answered, <S%H559><s%> We will willingly <S%H5414><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> them. And they spread <S%H6566><s%> a garment, <S%H8071><s%> and did cast <S%H7993><s%> therein <S%H8033><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> the earrings <S%H5141><s%> of his prey. <S%H7998><s%>

And the weight <S%H4948><s%> of the golden <S%H2091><s%> earrings <S%H5141><s%> that he requested <S%H7592><s%> was a thousand <S%H505><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> shekels of gold; <S%H2091><s%> beside <S%H905><s%> ornaments, <S%H7720><s%> and collars, <S%H5188><s%> and purple <S%H713><s%> raiment <S%H899><s%> that was on <S%H5921><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Midian, <S%H4080><s%> and beside <S%H905><s%> the chains <S%H6060><s%> that were about their camels' <S%H1581><s%> necks. <S%H6677><s%>

And Gideon <S%H1439><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> an ephod <S%H646><s%> thereof, and put <S%H3322><s%> it in his city, <S%H5892><s%> even in Ophrah: <S%H6084><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> went thither <S%H8033><s%> a whoring <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> it: which thing became <S%H1961><s%> a snare <S%H4170><s%> to Gideon, <S%H1439><s%> and to his house. <S%H1004><s%>

Thus was Midian <S%H4080><s%> subdued <S%H3665><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> so that they lifted <S%H5375><s%> up their heads <S%H7218><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more. <S%H3254><s%> And the country <S%H776><s%> was in quietness <S%H8252><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Gideon. <S%H1439><s%>
And Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joash <S%H3101><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> and dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in his own house. <S%H1004><s%>
And Gideon <S%H1439><s%> had three score <S%H7657><s%> and ten sons <S%H1121><s%> of his body <S%H3409><s%> begotten: <S%H3318><s%> for he had <S%H1961><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> wives. <S%H802><s%>

And his concubine <S%H6370><s%> that was in Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> she also <S%H1571><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> him a son, <S%H1121><s%> whose <S%H853><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> he called <S%H7760><s%> Abimelech. <S%H40><s%>

And Gideon <S%H1439><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joash <S%H3101><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> in a good <S%H2896><s%> old <S%H7872><s%> age, <S%H7872><s%> and was buried <S%H6912><s%> in the sepulcher <S%H6913><s%> of Joash <S%H3101><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> in Ophrah <S%H6084><s%> of the Abiezrites. <S%H33><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, as soon <S%H834><s%> as Gideon <S%H1439><s%> was dead, <S%H4191><s%> that the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> turned <S%H7725><s%> again, <S%H7725><s%> and went a whoring <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Baalim, <S%H1168><s%> and made <S%H7760><s%> Baalberith <S%H1170><s%> their god. <S%H430><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> remembered <S%H2142><s%> not the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God, <S%H430><s%> who had delivered <S%H5337><s%> them out of the hands <S%H3027><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> their enemies <S%H341><s%> on every <S%H5437><s%> side: <S%H5439><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> showed <S%H6213><s%> they kindness <S%H2617><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jerubbaal, <S%H3378><s%> namely, Gideon, <S%H1439><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> the goodness <S%H2896><s%> which he had showed <S%H6213><s%> to Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
